title: Summer pudding
ingredients: ['600 g (1 lb 5 oz) mixed summer fruit (raspberries, blueberries, redcurrants, sliced strawberries)', '2 ripe peaches or nectarines, stoned and diced', '3 tbsp sugar, or to taste', '150 ml (5 fl oz) cranberry juice', '8 thin slices white bread, about 200 g (7 oz) in total, preferably 1–2 days old', 'To serve (optional)', 'reduced-fat crème fraîche']
